comment: Bowen was fantastic! A lot of stuff almost every week. Other than the tests, almost everything else was "free points" just open book stuff to complete that gave you a nice boost. 3 tests, worth a total of 60% of your grade. All quizzes were only worth a total of 3.5% of your grade and could have notes. Just study and you will pass the tests!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: His class is set up with minimal busy work but ample opportunity to help your grade if you do poorly on an exam. I got a 60 on the first one and scraped a 90 in the class after realizing how to study and prepare better for the exam. He doesn't ask for much each week but I feel much more knowledgeable about this class than fin acct.

This semester has just barley started but I think I can go ahead and safely give professor Bowen this rating. Compared to my other accounting classes, I have already learned just as much as I did throughout the whole semester. Professor Bowen makes things really easy to understand and gives real world examples to further help the students' learning
